level.text: 600.1 This chapter establishes the procedures by which the Construction Codesoordinating Board (“Board”) and the Department of Consumer and Regulatoryffairs (“Department”) shall comply with the requirements of Mayor’s Order009-22, dated February 25, 2009, in implementing the promulgation of revisionso the District of Columbia Construction Codes (D.C. Official Code §§ 6-1401t seq. and Title 12 of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations)“Construction Codes”).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 31 DCR 6111 (December 7, 1984); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 124 (January 1, 2010).

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: The Building Code Advisory Committee, established by Mayor’srder 81-65, dated March 9, 1981, was amended by Mayor’s Order 89-257, datedovember 7, 1989.
